stories.text:
Hi fellow builders,

I've been working in digital marketing for 15+ years and reporting Instagram analytics has always been a serious embarrassment when it came to present meaningful ROI-driven results other than followers, likes and comments ...

Things got a little better when Instagram introduced its business tools back in 2007-8. Yet, Instagram "business insights" are pretty "light" to say the least and very vanity-driven.

Plus, the level of complexity and requirements to unlock all Instagram's metrics from Meta's APIs is ridiculous.

There are analytics softwares and apps doing a better job. Still, they cost around $29 or $49 per month (and way more!). Creators need these analytics to grow better and they may wanna spend this money on equipment and gear rather than an .

That's why we built ABSOLUTE CREATORS with my friend Damiano.

The required setup is to have an Instagram business account connected to a Facebook business page (sic).

Ideal for: - in-house marketing teams, brand and social media managers - marketing agencies - eCommerce shop/DNVB owners (especially Shopify) - SaaS startups - SMB owners - Creator economy at large

Look it up on the App Store. Thanks for reading!
stories.title: Show HN: A free iOS app to get better analytics than Instagram Insights
